      • setOwningScene

        public void setOwningScene(Scene scene)
        Description copied from class: SceneObject
        Sets the owning scene of this SceneObject. This method should exclusively be used in the add(SceneObject) method of a Scene to avoid timing and ownership problems.
        Overrides:
        setOwningScene in class SceneObject
        Parameters:
        scene - Scene to which this SceneObject will belong
